title: Tickboard UI Bug Fixes
description: Fix bugs found during initial testing of the Lit/Shoelace board UI
notes:
2026-01-20 09:09 - Completed [nwx]: Added tick-detail-drawer to tick-board.ts template. The issue was the drawer component existed but was never rendered. Key changes: 1) Added Note and BlockerDetail type imports, 2) Added state for notes/blockers/parentTitle, 3) Modified handleTickSelected to fetch full details via fetchTick API, 4) Added handleDrawerClose to reset state. The drawer is now bound with .tick, .open, .notesList, .blockerDetails, and parent-title properties.
2026-01-20 09:10 - Completed [y46]: Fixed missing plus icon in create button by adding slot="prefix" to the sl-icon element in tick-header.ts:282. This is a common Shoelace pattern - icons inside sl-button need the slot attribute to render correctly. Same pattern was already used correctly for the search icon in the header.
2026-01-20 09:11 - Completed [6ds]: Fixed toast notification close button visibility by adding CSS styling for sl-alert::part(close-button). The closable attribute was correctly set, but the button was invisible due to missing color styling against the dark theme. Added --subtext0 for base color and --text for hover state.
2026-01-20 09:12 - Completed [9zw]: Fixed activity feed bell icon by adding slot="prefix" to sl-icon element in tick-activity-feed.ts:342. Also fixed the refresh button icon at line 355 for consistency. This is the same Shoelace pattern issue that was fixed in [y46] - icons inside sl-button need slot="prefix" to render correctly. All 4 tasks in this epic now use consistent Shoelace icon patterns.
2026-01-20 09:21 - Completed [go3]: Fixed cloud deployment 404s by incrementing service worker cache version from v2 to v3 in sw.js:6-7. Root cause: PWA service worker used stale-while-revalidate for /assets/ and cached old index.html referencing non-existent asset hashes. Key insight: tickboard.dev is a relay-only Cloudflare Worker that proxies requests to local tk board servers via WebSocket - it doesn't host static assets itself. The service worker cache versioning should be incremented whenever UI assets are rebuilt with new hashes.
2026-01-20 09:24 - Completed [35q]: Updated epic filter dropdowns in both tick-header.ts and tick-board.ts to show 'id - title' format with .epic-id CSS class for monospace/muted styling. Both desktop header dropdown and mobile filter drawer now consistent. Bumped service worker cache to v4 for deployment.
2026-01-20 09:26 - Completed [q68]: Fixed 'cloud: unknown message type: registered' warning by adding a handler case for 'registered' message in internal/tickboard/cloud/client.go:425. The cloud server sends 'registered' as confirmation after the client sends 'register', but the handleMessages switch statement had no case for it. Simple 3-line fix adding a no-op handler. Note: There are pre-existing build errors in internal/ticks/client.go (missing imports) that are unrelated to this epic.
